description: This file defines an interface 'INoteRepository' within the namespace 'NotesBackend.Repositories' for abstracting data access operations related to 'Note' objects, including methods to get all notes, get a note by ID, add, update, and delete notes.

classes.name: INoteRepository
classes.description: Interface providing methods for accessing and manipulating note data in the data layer.

methods.name: GetAll
methods.description: Retrieves a collection of all notes.

methods.name: GetById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its unique identifier (Guid).

methods.name: Add
methods.description: Adds a new note to the data store.

methods.name: Update
methods.description: Updates an existing note. Returns true if successful.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a note identified by its Guid. Returns true if successful.
